description: A tool for running Python code in a REPL environment.

inputs.name: description
inputs.value: A Python shell. Use this to execute python commands. Input should be a valid python command. If you want to see the output of a value, you should print it out with `print(...)`.
inputs.default: A Python shell. Use this to execute python commands. Input should be a valid python command. If you want to see the output of a value, you should print it out with `print(...)`.

inputs.name: global_imports
inputs.info: A comma-separated list of modules to import globally, e.g. 'math,numpy'.
